Module.Content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en-us"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> <title>Cluster Rush</title> <link rel="icon" href="./icon.jpg"> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/tabcloak.js"></script> <style> /* a style sheet needs to be present for cursor hiding and custom cursors to work. */ </style> </head> <body> <center><canvas class="emscripten" id="canvas" oncontextmenu="event.preventDefault()" height="800px" width="1000px"></canvas></center> <script type="text/javascript"> var Module = { TOTAL_MEMORY: 268435456, errorhandler: null, // arguments: err, url, line. This function must return 'true' if the error is handled, otherwise 'false' compatibilitycheck: null, backgroundColor: "#222C36", splashStyle: "Dark", dataUrl: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/Release/NG.data", codeUrl: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/Release/NG.js", asmUrl: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/Release/NG.asm.js", memUrl: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/Release/NG.mem", }; console.log("If the file NG.mem returns a 404 error, that is ok!") </script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/Release/UnityLoader.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ToxicBurstXZ/toxicburstxz.github.io@main/projects/clusterrush/js/main.js"></script> </body> </html> </Content> </Module>
